actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of State and the Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development to prioritize efforts to support access to primary and secondary education for displaced children, and for other purposes.
short_title: Protecting Girls' Access to Education in Vulnerable Settings Act

titles.title: Protecting Girls' Access to Education in Vulnerable Settings Act

To authorize the Secretary of State and the Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development to prioritize efforts to support access to primary and secondary education for displaced children, and for other purposes.
Protecting Girls' Access to Education in Vulnerable Settings Act
